item.description:
Hi Everyone!

Looking forward to our next meetup!

Join us to share what you have manifested/attracted since the last meetup. If you're just learning to live in conscious creation, bring your questions.

We meet from 10:00-11:30. If the weather is warm and sunny, let's sit outside. Otherwise, see you at our regular table in the back!

Have a great day!!!

Julie
item.how_to_find_us: small private room just beyond the soda station, table in back

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday Morning Meetup
